Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Material: MOTHER OF PEARL; SHELL (OSTRICH EGG); ENAMEL
Name: Bracelet
Description: Typical C-Group bracelet. The reconstruction is modern: eleven rectangular mother-of-pearl plates divided by two groups of four disc-shaped beads cut from ostrich eggshell. Beads made from ostrich eggshell and disc-shaped beads of enamel, varying in colour between sky blue and dark grey, alternate at both extremities.
